Â _Â =Â db.Callback().Row().After("gorm:row").Register(callBackAfterName,Â after)

Â return
}

varÂ _Â gorm.PluginÂ =Â &TracePlugin{}

funcÂ before(dbÂ *gorm.DB)Â {
Â db.InstanceSet(startTime,Â time.Now())
Â return
}

funcÂ after(dbÂ *gorm.DB)Â {
Â _ctxÂ :=Â db.Statement.Context
Â ctx,Â okÂ :=Â _ctx.(core.Context)
Â ifÂ !okÂ {
Â Â return
Â }

Â _ts,Â isExistÂ :=Â db.InstanceGet(startTime)
Â ifÂ !isExistÂ {
Â Â return
Â }

Â ts,Â okÂ :=Â _ts.(time.Time)
Â ifÂ !okÂ {
Â Â return
Â }

Â sqlÂ :=Â db.Dialector.Explain(db.Statement.SQL.String(),Â db.Statement.Vars...)

Â sqlInfoÂ :=Â new(trace.SQL)
Â sqlInfo.TimestampÂ =Â time_parse.CSTLayoutString()
Â sqlInfo.SQLÂ =Â sql
Â sqlInfo.StackÂ =Â utils.FileWithLineNum()
Â sqlInfo.RowsÂ =Â db.Statement.RowsAffected
Â sqlInfo.CostSecondsÂ =Â time.Since(ts).Seconds()
Â ctx.Trace().AppendSQL(sqlInfo)

Â return
}
